song.title: Spitting Images
song.info:
(c) basehead / fm 1997 .. into darkness .. samples: korg x3, roland jv880, sabres of paradise (cd), heatbeat, groo, vinnie, chrylian, audiomonster, heatbeat, virgill, siren, necros (roland xp50), radix, octoque
***** Steppin' out PC-S3M (F#min7)composed by(Ebmaj9) b a s e h e a d / f m 9 5 for the musicdisk.. (with tunes by... me ..)
samples from all over: dizzy.vinnie.paul hardcastle.chick corea.mezzoforte.and plenty of other sources....
big greetings go out to all of fm! (jak,md,bj,nec), kfmf (mael,khy,phoen,etc.), everybody who doesn't suck on #trax =) =), all irc warriors, all chicks into acid jazz..., my mom!@!#, my music teacher, steve!, and chuckb for his never ending knowledge of the finer points of studio equipment! (haha!)
also shoutz to NHP, zodiak, and all the euros who got the music scene rollin.. huge shouts to rob hubbard, jeroen tel, and sequencer for being among the best of the c64 old school!
bye! -bh95-fm/imphobia/kfmf-
